q2: Are the Italians expected to bounce back from missing the World Cup this go around, and do well in the next World Cup?
a2: I think they will play with a chip on their shoulder for sure, to prove the world.
q3: Will Mancini do well as head coach?
a3: I think he will do well but we'll see when in the Euros.
a4: is a tricolour featuring three equally-sized vertical pales of green, white and red, with the green at the hoist side.
q5: Do you think they will come back with a really good uniform to signify their change?
a5: no i dont think they will
